title: David Cameron’s EU Speech
itunes:author: Professor Simon Hix
description: Contributor(s): Professor Simon Hix | Professor Simon Hix discusses David Cameron’s recent speech on Britain’s place in the EU which included the possibility of a referendum on the subject.
